reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The Privacy Policy clearly states that data collection is declared when using the service.
reply.reference: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. URL: https://cfsleadershipcourses.com/privacy

source_documents.excerpt:

We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects the following types of data: Email address, First name and last name, Usage Data (including Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, pages visited, time and date of visit, time spent on pages, mobile device information, mobile operating system, mobile Internet browser type, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data).

content: Usage Data (including Internet Protocol address, browser type, browser version, pages visited, time and date of visit, time spent on pages, mobile device information, mobile operating system, mobile Internet browser type, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly outlines the types of data collected, including personally identifiable information and various usage data. These details cover data points related to the user's identity as well as information automatically collected during app usage.
reply.reference:
Email address
First name and last name
Usage Data
URL: https://cfsleadershipcourses.com/privacy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The Privacy Policy clearly states that the app describes the purposes of collecting and using data, ensuring transparency for the users.
reply.reference: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of the sale of personal information by contacting the service provider.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the right to opt-out of the sale of personal information by contacting the service provider directly.
reply.reference: You have the right to opt-out of the sale of Your personal information. Once We receive and confirm a verifiable consumer request from You, we will stop selling Your personal information. To exercise Your right to opt-out, please contact Us. URL: https://cfsleadershipcourses.com/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app shares personal information with different categories of third parties.
reply.reference: We may share Your personal information identified in the above categories with the following categories of third parties: Service Providers, Our affiliates, Our business partners. URL: https://cfsleadershipcourses.com/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Service Providers, affiliates, business partners, and third party vendors authorized by agents or employers.

content: Third party vendors authorized by agents or employers

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions specific categories of third parties with whom data may be shared, providing clarity on the types of entities involved in data sharing.
reply.reference:
Service Providers
Our affiliates
Our business partners
Only Third party vendors to whom Your agents or employers authorize Us to disclose Your personal information in connection with products or services We provide to You. URL: https://cfsleadershipcourses.com/privacy
